elements.name: Verify Assignment Links in Software Testing Course

steps.name: the user is on the Software Testing course page
the user sees the links for each assignment
the user should receive a warning when an assignment link doesn't exist
the user should verify the link format of each assignment link

elements.name: Verify Student Groups in Software Testing Course

steps.name: the user is on the Software Testing course page
the user says that a student "Luna Geens" belongs to student group "1"
the user should be in a student group
the user should receive a warning when he does not belong to that student group number
